info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:57PM EDT until August 05 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL CHESTERFIELD AND EAST CENTRAL POWHATAN COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RICHMOND... At 456 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bon Air, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Bon Air, University Of Richmond and Downtown Richmond around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pocahontas State Park, Beach, Midlothian, Subletts and Chesterfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
